sa-12.plain_english_explanation: Supply Chain Protection ensures that the software and hardware components used in an organization's IT systems are secure and free from vulnerabilities introduced by third-party suppliers.

sa-13.plain_english_explanation: Trustworthiness control ensures that only authorized individuals have access to sensitive information and systems.

sa-15.plain_english_explanation: This control ensures that a standardized development process, tools, and standards are in place to help create secure software and systems.
sa-15.example_implementation: Establish a clear and documented development process that includes security requirements, use secure coding standards, and utilize tools like static code analysis to identify and fix security vulnerabilities early in the development lifecycle.

sc-1.plain_english_explanation: This control requires organizations to establish and maintain policies and procedures to manage their information security program.
